description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time... },
duration_in_months: For detailed information please refer to the tender document
full_summary:
**W3707-24-ES02: Electrical Services for CFHA - Esquimalt**
=====================================================

**RFP Reference:** WS4203634864 - Doc4232228380
**Province:** British Columbia
**Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Victoria
**Notices:** The RFP has been amended. The closing time for the bid submission has been extended. Bidders have until 14:00 EST on November 29, 2023 to submit their bids.

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

**Deadline:** November 29, 2023 14:00 EST

**Contact Information:**

* Christine Seguin, Procurement Officer, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Phone: [Not Available]
* Email: [christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17768198?extsite=MTc3NjgxOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Annex A Statement of Work:**
The procurement seeks to appoint a contractor to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services to the Crown owned portfolio. This includes routine maintenance, repairs, and minor improvements to existing infrastructure.

**Optional Teleconference:** Bidders are invited to attend a teleconference to discuss the Statement of Work and any questions they may have. The teleconferences will be held on November 1, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST
